fullplot: In this variation on director Vadim's own, more acclaimed Et Dieu Crèa La Femme (1956, the same title in French), the vamp Robin Shea marries charming carpenter Billy Moran, only to get out of prison, but soon decides to seduce James Tiernan, who runs for state governor.

title: And God Created Woman
